task: Go to apple.com website in Safari

steps.model_reply:
Thought: I noticed that there are several application icons in the dock at the bottom of the screen, and the one I need to click on is the one with the blue and white wave design, which represents the Safari browser. It's located in the second position from the left, and by clicking on it, I can open the browser and start my web browsing.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(154,860)<|box_end|>')
steps.thought: I noticed that there are several application icons in the dock at the bottom of the screen, and the one I need to click on is the one with the blue and white wave design, which represents the Safari browser. steps.model_reply:

This process usually takes a few seconds, and during this time, I can see the loading animation on the screen. Once the browser is fully ready, I will be able to enter the URL for apple.com.
